/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. Cars are parked along the side of the road, indicating a bustling city life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape.
